snippet: The F.B.I. announced Monday the arrest of a Chinese citizen in the investigation of a fire at the Chinese Consulate in San Francisco on Jan. 1.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation announces arrest of Chinese citizen Yan Feng in investigation of fire at Chinese Consulate in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. announced Monday the arrest of a Chinese citizen in the investigation of a fire at the Chinese Consulate in San Francisco on Jan. 1.

headline.main: California: Arrest Made in Fire at Consulate
headline.print_headline: California: Arrest Made in Fire at Consulate
